root: ^Scrawled Handwriting: I wonder... how is this puzzle meant to be solved? If anyone is reading this, I discovered another curious block that I picked up around the corner. These button contraptions seem to require an order as to which is activated.

^Scrawled Handwriting: I picked up the block and placed it behind me on the switch next to this yellow pillar. That then allowed me to pick up the block and place both of them on the 2 switches ahead to unlock the door.
